text: Ardcroney Burial Mound is a burial mound (Linkardstown-type cist) located in County Tipperary, Ireland. ==Location== Ardcroney Burial Mound is located about east-southeast of Ardcroney.http://www.themodernantiquarian.com/site/7755/ardcroney.htmlhttp://www.archaeology.ie/sites/default/files/media/pdf/monuments- in-state-care-tipperary-north.pdf ==References== Category:National Monuments in County Tipperary Category:Archaeological sites in County Tipperary
title: Ardcroney Burial Mound
